item.title: How to make animated gifs from Matplotlib plots easily
item.description: The problem If you Google how to make an animated Matplotlib graph, you end up with code like that: fig, ax = plt.subplots() x = np.arange(0, 2*np.pi, 0.01) line, = ax.plot(x, np.sin(x)) def animate(i): line.set_ydata(np.sin(x + i/10…

item.title: Using a neural network to generate your next startup name
item.description: Inspired by a Dan Hon article on how to generate British placenames, I decided to train my own network to generate startup names. The original code was made by Andej Karpathy, but there is a more modern and concise version in Keras, available here…

item.title: Tutorial

item.title: Converting a Caffe model to TensorFlow
item.description: Converting a Caffe model to TensorFlow The Caffe Model Zoo is an extraordinary place where reasearcher share their models. item.title: Faster inference in TensorFlow using XLA.
item.description: About inference Using neural networks is primarily made of 2 phases: training your model and using it. The later part can also be called inference, forward pass or evaluation. For most researchers, most of the time is used by training : they have to retrain using different architectures or different parameters…
